name: power87
description: A discord bot filled with 87 power.

scripts.start: pm2 start main.js --name power87; pm2 monit
scripts.update: git pull; pm2 stop power87; pm2 reset power87; pm2 start power87; pm2 monit
scripts.start-test: pm2 start main.js --name power87-test; pm2 monit
scripts.restart-test: pm2 stop power87-test; pm2 reset power87-test; pm2 start power87-test; pm2 monit
